!Guard Bayard: To find the next stone you must defeat the* Archon of Halisha* inside the* Four Sepulchers*. To enter will not be easy. If you can't form a strong party, go to the* Shrine of the Loyal*. There you'll find Halisha's subordinates. Collect 700 of their marks and the* Archon of Halisha* will appear.%% They include Grave Scarabs, Scavenger Scarabs, Grave Ants, Scavenger Ants, Shrine Knights, and Shrine Guards.
